meanings.definition: A person or thing that is exceptionally skilled or excellent.
meanings.sent1: My friend Sarah is a real crackerjacks at playing the piano.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic at the shop is a crackerjacks when it comes to fixing cars.
meanings.sent3: The team captain was a crackerjacks at motivating the players during the game.
meanings.sent4: Her grandmother was a crackerjacks at knitting, creating beautiful scarves and hats.
meanings.sent5: The detective was a crackerjacks at solving mysteries, always one step ahead.

meanings.definition: A type of candy-coated popcorn and peanut snack.
meanings.sent1: I love to snack on crackerjacks while watching movies.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoyed eating crackerjacks at the baseball game.
meanings.sent3: She brought a box of crackerjacks to share with her classmates during recess.
meanings.sent4: The circus vendor sold colorful bags of crackerjacks to the excited children.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly made crackerjacks filled the air at the fair.
